Name: The AristoCats
Credit: Dir: Wolfgang Reitherman With: Phil Harris, Eva Gabor, Sterling Holloway
Outline: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

Name: School of Rock
Credit: Dir: Richard Linklater With: Jack Black, Mike White, Joan Cusack
Outline: After being kicked out of a rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of a strict elementary private school, only to try and turn it into a rock band.

Name: Coffee and Cigarettes
Credit: Dir: Jim Jarmusch With: Bill Murray, Tom Waits, Roberto Benigni
Outline: A series of vignettes that all have coffee and cigarettes in common.

Name: Black Snake Moan
Credit: Dir: Craig Brewer With: Christina Ricci, Samuel L. Jackson, Justin Timberlake
Outline: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.

Name: Wayne's World
Credit: Dir: Penelope Spheeris With: Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Rob Lowe
Outline: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

Name: 8 Mile
Credit: Dir: Curtis Hanson With: Eminem, Brittany Murphy, Kim Basinger
Outline: A young rapper, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap, harder than it may seem.

Name: Velvet Goldmine
Credit: Dir: Todd Haynes With: Ewan McGregor, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Christian Bale
Outline: In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.

Name: Frank
Credit: Dir: Lenny Abrahamson With: Michael Fassbender, Domhnall Gleeson, Maggie Gyllenhaal
Outline: Jon, a young wanna-be musician, discovers he's bitten off more than he can chew when he joins an eccentric pop band led by the mysterious and enigmatic Frank.

Name: I'm Not There.
Credit: Dir: Todd Haynes With: Christian Bale, Cate Blanchett, Heath Ledger
Outline: Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.

Name: Up in Smoke
Credit: Dir: Lou Adler With: Cheech Marin, Tommy Chong, Strother Martin
Outline: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

Name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, George Carlin
Outline: Two seemingly dumb teens struggle to prepare a historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

Name: Dirty Dancing
Credit: Dir: Emile Ardolino With: Patrick Swayze, Jennifer Grey, Jerry Orbach
Outline: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

Name: That Thing You Do!
Credit: Dir: Tom Hanks With: Tom Hanks, Liv Tyler, Charlize Theron
Outline: A Pennsylvania band scores a hit in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as it can, with lots of help from its manager.

Name: Detroit Rock City
Credit: Dir: Adam Rifkin With: Edward Furlong, Giuseppe Andrews, James DeBello
Outline: A comedy about four teenagers in 1978 who try to scam their way into a KISS concert.

Name: The Wedding Singer
Credit: Dir: Frank Coraci With: Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Christine Taylor
Outline: Robbie, the singer and Julia, the waitress are both engaged to be married but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

Name: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
Credit: Dir: Liam Lynch With: Jack Black, Kyle Gass, JR Reed
Outline: In Venice Beach, naive Midwesterner JB bonds with local slacker KG and they form the rock band Tenacious D. Setting out to become the world's greatest band is no easy feat, so they set out to steal what could be the answer to their prayers -- a magical guitar pick housed in a rock-and-roll museum some 300 miles away.

Name: If I Stay
Credit: Dir: R.J. Cutler With: ChloÃ« Grace Moretz, Mireille Enos, Jamie Blackley
Outline: Life changes in an instant for young Mia Hall after a car accident puts her in a coma. During an out-of-body experience, she must decide whether to wake up and live a life far different than she had imagined. The choice is hers if she can go on.

Name: Saturday Night Fever
Credit: Dir: John Badham With: John Travolta, Karen Lynn Gorney, Barry Miller
Outline: A Brooklyn teenager feels his only chance to succeed is as the king of the disco floor. His carefree youth and weekend dancing help him to forget the reality of his bleak life.

Name: Empire Records
Credit: Dir: Allan Moyle With: Anthony LaPaglia, Debi Mazar, Maxwell Caulfield
Outline: The employees of an independent music store learn about each other as they try anything to stop the store being absorbed by a large chain.

Name: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
Credit: Dir: Jake Kasdan With: John C. Reilly, Jenna Fischer, David Krumholtz
Outline: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

Name: The Soloist
Credit: Dir: Joe Wright With: Jamie Foxx, Robert Downey Jr., Catherine Keener
Outline: A Los Angeles journalist befriends a homeless Juilliard-trained musician, while looking for a new article for the paper.

Name: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
Credit: Dir: Peter Sollett With: Michael Cera, Kat Dennings, Aaron Yoo
Outline: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes.

Name: Notorious
Credit: Dir: George Tillman Jr. With: Jamal Woolard, Anthony Mackie, Derek Luke
Outline: The life and death story of Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

Name: The Runaways
Credit: Dir: Floria Sigismondi With: Kristen Stewart, Dakota Fanning, Michael Shannon
Outline: A coming-of-age biographical film about the 1970s teenage all-girl rock band The Runaways. This film also explores the relationship between band members Joan Jett and Cherie Currie.

Name: Step Up
Credit: Dir: Anne Fletcher With: Channing Tatum, Jenna Dewan Tatum, Damaine Radcliff
Outline: Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.

Name: Dreamgirls
Credit: Dir: Bill Condon With: BeyoncÃ© Knowles, Jamie Foxx, Eddie Murphy
Outline: A trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960s, facing their own personal struggles along the way.

Name: Music and Lyrics
Credit: Dir: Marc Lawrence With: Hugh Grant, Drew Barrymore, Scott Porter
Outline: A washed up singer is given a couple days to compose a chart-topping hit for an aspiring teen sensation. Though he's never written a decent lyric in his life, he sparks with an offbeat younger woman with a flair for words.

Name: Step Up Revolution
Credit: Dir: Scott Speer With: Kathryn McCormick, Ryan Guzman, Cleopatra Coleman
Outline: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

Name: Pitch Perfect 2
Credit: Dir: Elizabeth Banks With: Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, Hailee Steinfeld
Outline: After a humiliating command performance at The Kennedy Center, the Barden Bellas enter an international competition that no American group has ever won in order to regain their status and right to perform.

Name: Happy Feet
Credit: Dir: George Miller, Warren Coleman With: Elijah Wood, Brittany Murphy, Hugh Jackman
Outline: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

Name: Footloose
Credit: Dir: Herbert Ross With: Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow
Outline: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

Name: Get Him to the Greek
Credit: Dir: Nicholas Stoller With: Jonah Hill, Russell Brand, Elisabeth Moss
Outline: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.

Name: Burlesque
Credit: Dir: Steve Antin With: Cher, Christina Aguilera, Alan Cumming
Outline: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

Name: Sister Act
Credit: Dir: Emile Ardolino With: Whoopi Goldberg, Maggie Smith, Kathy Najimy
Outline: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

Name: Step Up 2: The Streets
Credit: Dir: Jon M. Chu With: Robert Hoffman, Briana Evigan, Cassie Ventura
Outline: Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.

Name: A Night at the Roxbury
Credit: Dir: John Fortenberry With: Chris Kattan, Will Ferrell, Raquel Gardner
Outline: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

Name: Step Up 3D
Credit: Dir: Jon M. Chu With: Sharni Vinson, Rick Malambri, Adam G. Sevani
Outline: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.

Name: The Rocker
Credit: Dir: Peter Cattaneo With: Rainn Wilson, Josh Gad, Christina Applegate
Outline: The Rocker tells the story of a failed drummer who is given a second chance at fame. Robert "Fish" Fishman...

Name: Rock Star
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Mark Wahlberg, Jennifer Aniston, Dominic West
Outline: Lead singer of a tribute band becomes lead singer of the real band he idolizes.

Name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
Credit: Dir: Peter Hewitt With: Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, William Sadler
Outline: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

Name: Save the Last Dance
Credit: Dir: Thomas Carter With: Julia Stiles, Sean Patrick Thomas, Kerry Washington
Outline: A white midwestern girl moves to Chicago, where her new boyfriend is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

Name: Freaky Friday
Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Jamie Lee Curtis, Lindsay Lohan, Mark Harmon
Outline: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

Name: Wayne's World 2
Credit: Dir: Stephen Surjik With: Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Christopher Walken
Outline: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

Name: The Bodyguard
Credit: Dir: Mick Jackson With: Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp
Outline: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to a pop singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

Name: Flashdance
Credit: Dir: Adrian Lyne With: Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala
Outline: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

Name: Airheads
Credit: Dir: Michael Lehmann With: Brendan Fraser, Steve Buscemi, Adam Sandler
Outline: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head DJ refuses to play them.

Name: Captain Corelli's Mandolin
Credit: Dir: John Madden With: Nicolas Cage, PenÃ©lope Cruz, John Hurt
Outline: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during WWII, his fiancee falls in love with the local Italian commander.

Name: Footloose
Credit: Dir: Craig Brewer With: Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough, Dennis Quaid
Outline: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

Name: The Last Song
Credit: Dir: Julie Anne Robinson With: Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth, Greg Kinnear
Outline: A rebellious girl is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.

Credit: Dir: Mark Christopher With: Ryan Phillippe, Salma Hayek, Sela Ward
Outline: Famous 70s NYC nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

Name: Magic Mike XXL
Credit: Dir: Gregory Jacobs With: Channing Tatum, Joe Manganiello, Matt Bomer
Outline: Three years after Mike bowed out of the stripper life at the top of his game, he and the remaining Kings of Tampa hit the road to Myrtle Beach to put on one last blow-out performance.

Name: Be Cool
Credit: Dir: F. Gary Gray With: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Dwayne Johnson
Outline: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

Name: Drumline
Credit: Dir: Charles Stone III With: Nick Cannon, Zoe Saldana, Orlando Jones
Outline: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

Name: Coyote Ugly
Credit: Dir: David McNally With: Piper Perabo, Adam Garcia, John Goodman
Outline: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

Name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
Credit: Dir: Bill Duke With: Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Najimy, Maggie Smith
Outline: The sisters come back to Delores's show to get her back as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a...

Name: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
Credit: Dir: Jim Fall With: Hilary Duff, Adam Lamberg, Clayton Snyder
Outline: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

Name: Honey
Credit: Dir: Bille Woodruff With: Jessica Alba, Mekhi Phifer, Romeo Miller
Outline: Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
Credit: Dir: Tim Hill With: Jason Lee, David Cross, Cameron Richardson
Outline: A struggling songwriter named Dave Seville finds success when he comes across a trio of singing chipmunks: mischievous leader Alvin, brainy Simon, and chubby, impressionable Theodore.

Name: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
Credit: Dir: Jim Sheridan With: 50 Cent, Joy Bryant, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje
Outline: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Jason Lee, Zachary Levi, David Cross
Outline: The world famous singing pre-teen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

Name: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
Genre: Comedy | Drama | Family | Music | Musical | Romance
Credit: Dir: Kenny Ortega With: Zac Efron, Vanessa Hudgens, Ashley Tisdale
Outline: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

Name: Hannah Montana: The Movie
Credit: Dir: Peter Chelsom With: Miley Cyrus, Emily Osment, Billy Ray Cyrus
Outline: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

Name: Spice World
Credit: Dir: Bob Spiers With: Melanie Brown, Emma Bunton, Melanie Chisholm
Outline: World famous pop group The Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

Name: Crossroads
Credit: Dir: Tamra Davis With: Britney Spears, Anson Mount, Zoe Saldana
Outline: Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a road trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.
